enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: SBSTA Chair Halldór Thorgeirsson (Iceland) opened the session.
Noting that the SBSTA vice-chair had resigned, he said a replacement nomination was expected from GRULAC.
Tatyana Osokova (Uzbekistan) will serve as rapporteur.
The SBSTA adopted the provisional agenda (FCCC/SBSTA/2002/7).
